channel.title: Need Help :)
channel.description:
Hey guys, I just need help finding a good base. I've seen and used a lot of DSPK/Highly Modified PI ones. I know they look boss on the outside (To me), but I hear they don't run well. I was just wondering, should I start with the original PI? Please suggest a PI server because I don't know anything about Hyperion, ect. Thanks.
P.S. - I'm a beginner, so I want something that will help me learn.

item.title: Need Help :)
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

jarrodbaws:

Hybrid PVP V3 runsvery smoothly very easy to run/setp & edit wish u luck.

Umm, thanks for trying to help, but you’re wrong there :P.

Read full topic
